content.query:
-- SECRET = '?sv=2021-12-02&ss=b&srt=co&sp=rwdlaciytfx&se=2023-03-24T23:32:45Z&st=2023-03-21T15:32:45Z&spr=https&sig=2FTPtowJCaAFrgi%2BjqXz02z6faJ%2FsmOhUC6cFv2pJFQ%3D'
-- Created 21/3, expires 24/3

-- Clear the external data source 
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE driver_standings_ext_table
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE blobstore_ds
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT file_format_csv
DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [synapseSAS]

-- Create database scoped credential for managed ID
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [synapseSAS]
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2021-12-02&ss=b&srt=co&sp=rwdlaciytfx&se=2023-03-24T23:32:45Z&st=2023-03-21T15:32:45Z&spr=https&sig=2FTPtowJCaAFrgi%2BjqXz02z6faJ%2FsmOhUC6cFv2pJFQ%3D'
GO

-- Create the blob store as external data source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE blobstore_ds
WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'wasbs://import@lhsblobstore.blob.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = synapseSAS,
    TYPE = HADOOP
    )

--Create an external file format for DELIMITED TEXT files
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT file_format_csv
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',')
    )

-- Create external table and define schema
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE br725Test_ext_table
(
    driverStandingsId varchar(100),
    raceId varchar(100),
    driverId varchar(100),
    points varchar(100),
    position_id varchar(100),
    positionText    varchar(100),
    wins varchar(100)
)  
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'Archived/20230321/G650-BR725/Climb-Aircraft-EPS/19/',
    DATA_SOURCE = blobstore_ds,  
    FILE_FORMAT = file_format_csv
)
GO

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM br725Test_ext_table
